LanguageData.AnimalistSlab_Broad.label: 泛靈文化木板(大)
LanguageData.AnimalistSlab_Broad.description: 刻著泛靈文化象徵的木製浮雕地板裝飾。

LanguageData.AnimalistSlab_Medium.description: 刻著泛靈文化象徵的木製浮雕地板裝飾。

LanguageData.RusticRug_Broad.label: 鄉村文化地毯(大)
